ParameterBlueprint.name: SampleNumber
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: This parameter includes the sample number, it is just required when different sample numbers are required

ParameterBlueprint.name: SampleName
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Here is the sample name, e.g. NIST Standard material A08E15.

ParameterBlueprint.name: SampleAmount
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Amount of sample used for measurement.

ParameterBlueprint.name: SampleConcentration
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Give Information about the Sample Concentration

ParameterBlueprint.name: Disposal
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Instructions on safe disposal of sample

ParameterBlueprint.name: HandlingPrecautions
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Special instructions for handling the sample

ParameterBlueprint.name: Storage
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Instructions on safe storage of sample

ParameterBlueprint.name: AutoSamplerPosition
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Sample position in auto sampler device

ParameterBlueprint.name: SampleReceipt
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Date and time when sample was received

ParameterBlueprint.name: Min
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Lower bound of boiling temperature range

ParameterBlueprint.name: Max
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Upper bound of boiling temperature range. Use only this value if sample has an actual boiling "point"

ParameterBlueprint.name: AtPressure
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Pressure at which the boiling point has been determined.

ParameterBlueprint.name: Min
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Lower bound of melting temperature range

ParameterBlueprint.name: Max
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Upper bound of melting temperature range. Use only this value if sample has an actual melting "point"

ParameterBlueprint.name: AtPressure
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: Pressure at which the melting point has been determined.

ParameterBlueprint.name: SubstanceNumber
ParameterBlueprint.Documentation: This parameter includes the substance number (consecutive number).
